originalText.text: I have never slept on a mattress that cradles you while you sleep. Best mattress I have purchased, the Hybrid. I truly recommend it

text.text: I have never slept on a mattress that cradles you while you sleep. Best mattress I have purchased, the Hybrid. I truly recommend it

originalText.text: Quality issues with an Allswell product within one week of purchase. Not able to be returned. Run around by customer service.  I would not purchase anything from Allswell.

text.text: Quality issues with an Allswell product within one week of purchase. Not able to be returned. Run around by customer service.  I would not purchase anything from Allswell.

originalText.text: Since Walmart won't post my review I know Google will. I bought a Allswell 4 inch copper infused mattress topper. $155 + tax. Brought it home & put it on the bed & opened it. Looked awful but figured it would "air out & expand". It didn't. It did get thicker but no bigger. Had several inches to cover mattress on every edge. I could possibly live with that. What I can't live with is the big shark bite out of the cover. None the big ridges running the length of the topper. Feels like you are trying to sleep on someone's legs. Where is the quality control? I see other reviewers complaining about the same thing. This is headed back to the store. I know this company helps kids but they need to sell a quality product over everything. It's a real hassle to get a product, try to use it then having to haul it back. Buy their products at your own risk.

originalText.text: Had Allswell hybrid for only 2 yrs. It sagging so bad and it has no support.  Me and my wife suffered from really bad back pain.  Won’t recommend anyone just spend more money on a more trustworthy brand
